title: Skin Exchange
body:
Hello all nation.

I currently have a few Poppy skins that I received from mystery gifting a while back (black smith one and this other red one) but I don't really play Poppy at all ! I was wondering if riot is able to exchange the skins (both of them) for a Masked Shaco skin since I play him a lot more often. Is it possible or nah? :o 

Thanks nation.

replies.body:
Hey MrPine,

Unfortunately, there's no refunds or exchanges when it comes to Mystery Gifts!
